## Description {#details}

List of PressureChanges in order of increasing, unique PSetID.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> a small fixed number, because we can fit more PressureChanges in an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> than ever need to be tracked per register class. If more PSets are affected, then we only track the most constrained.

Definition at line 140 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerpressure-h">RegisterPressure.h</a>.
